Keywords: Acolytes , Brotherhood of Mutants , Codex , Hellfire Club , Monster , Ruler , X-Men
Real Name: Max Eisenhardt
Special Powers
SYMBIOTIC FUSION: Plasticity, Super Senses. // If Venom Magneto is within 4 squares and line of fire of an opposing character, he can't be targeted by range attacks.
SYMBIOTIC MAGNETIC FIELD: Energy Shield/Deflection, Passenger: 4.
SYMBIOTIC MAGNETIC MASTERY: Telekinesis. Telekinesis as FREE.
SYMBIOTIC SUPREMACY: Leadership. When Venom Magneto uses it and succeeds, you may instead remove an action token from another friendly character with the Monster keyword within range and line of fire and give an action token to an opposing character adjacent to that character.
